hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "When the Iqamah is called for Salat do not come to it rushing, rather come to it walking, and while you have tranquility. What you catch of it then pray it, and what you missed of it, then complete it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَشْىِ إِلَى الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Walking To The Masjid
